text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC North Carolina Governor @RoyCooperNC protected the people of his state & the Queen City from the #COVID19 Petri dish hate rally convention you want to hold. NC Cooper VERY SMART TO dodge a bullet. Peoples’ lives are more important than 💰, but you don’t know that.
